LABEL: 0xD2F5
STRING: 「Reiri will die like this.」

LABEL: 0xD31E
STRING: That was what Mom said.

LABEL: 0xD33F
STRING: I couldn't do anything.

LABEL: 0xD366
STRING: I was of no use to them.

LABEL: 0xD391
STRING: However――

LABEL: 0xD3A7
STRING: If I didn't do anything, Reiri would die.

LABEL: 0xD3D7
STRING: Switching the tags on their hands...

LABEL: 0xD3FB
STRING: That alone might be enough to help Reiri.

LABEL: 0xD43B
STRING: 『It's all right now. The rest of the rescue team will be here to pick you up, so just wait here.』

LABEL: 0xD4A4
STRING: Without doing anything――

LABEL: 0xD4C1
STRING: If I didn't do anything――

LABEL: 0xD4E5
STRING: But for what reason――?

LABEL: 0xD503
STRING: 「Touri!

LABEL: 0xD514
STRING: If you don't hurry, she might not make it!」

LABEL: 0xD54B
STRING: 「But...

LABEL: 0xD55E
STRING: Will that really――?」

LABEL: 0xD583
STRING: Would that really save her?

LABEL: 0xD5A8
STRING: Was it really all right?

LABEL: 0xD5CE
STRING: Was it really all right for me to do that?

LABEL: 0xD5F4
STRING: 「Only you can do it!」

LABEL: 0xD619
STRING: Mom's appealing voice...

LABEL: 0xD63B
STRING: Her eyes...

LABEL: 0xD64D
STRING: They blew away my hesitation.

LABEL: 0xD679
STRING: 「You're the only one who can do it, Touri... so please!」

LABEL: 0xD77F
STRING: The rescue team arrived soon after.

LABEL: 0xD88B
STRING: 「Okay, then. Let me introduce myself.」

LABEL: 0xD8B4
STRING: I took a step forward as prompted.

LABEL: 0xD8E3
STRING: Everyone's gazes gathered to me.

LABEL: 0xD8FB
STRING: All the children of my age were looking at me.

LABEL: 0xD930
STRING: I took a deep breath.

LABEL: 0xD946
STRING: 「My name is Nomura Touri. I look forward to getting to know you.」

LABEL: 0xD979
STRING: 「――Umm, I have a sister called Reiri, but she's not here right now...

LABEL: 0xD9C1
STRING: Anyway, I hope we get along.」

LABEL: 0xD9EA
STRING: I bowed.

LABEL: 0xDA0E
STRING: Clap, clap, clap.

LABEL: 0xDA2F
STRING: I was met with a modest round of applause.

LABEL: 0xDA75
STRING: The room was a unique space that was like a mix of an elementary school classroom and a family living room.

LABEL: 0xDAB9
STRING: There were people of the same age who were neither classmates nor family members there.

LABEL: 0xDAF8
STRING: They were all there for different reasons.

LABEL: 0xDB32
STRING: The circumstances differed from person to person, but there was one thing in common.

LABEL: 0xDB7E
STRING: Everyone was missing their parents.

LABEL: 0xDBA8
STRING: Which meant that none of them had families――

LABEL: 0xDBD5
STRING: ――Except for me.

LABEL: 0xDBF5
STRING: I grabbed my hand behind my body..

LABEL: 0xDC28
STRING: Reiri, who was supposed to be there to grab it back, was not here.

LABEL: 0xDC6C
STRING: My precious sister.

LABEL: 0xDC90
STRING: My precious family member.

LABEL: 0xDCAE
STRING: I wouldn't lose anyone again.

LABEL: 0xDCC8
STRING: I didn't want to lose her.

LABEL: 0xDCE8
STRING: I was already――
